WhiteCoats Would Like To Send You Push Notifications. Notifications may include alerts, sounds and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings. Without this permission, we are unable to choose from photo library. Please go to the Permissions section inside the application settings and toggle the Storage permissions switch. open_drawer close_drawer Sign In With OTP
Example:\nI have started a new hospital in Jaipur 2 years ago. Does anyone have reference for accreditation consultants?\n\nI am pediatrician with 3 years of experience. Which college/hospital is the best pediatric cardiac surgery in india?\n\nI have a new practice in Pune. What is best way to get patients online without commissions?\n\nHow to manage postpartum hemorrhage in a primi with RHD? Example:\nA 72-year old female presented with acute mental status changes and one week h/o periorbital eye and neck swelling. She"'"s a known case of stage 3 multiple myeloma post stem cell transplant. On admission, she had bilateral optic disc edema,UTI. I am attaching how I managed this case and how the patient responded. Hope this helps the community. Example:\nCheck out the latest advisory from WHO on how to tackle long COVID in diabetic patients.\n\nBangalore Ophthalmic Society advises doctors against tie-ups with online platforms that charges commissions for patients.\n\nI am looking to hire 3 medical officers for my new hospital in indore.\n\nPlease reach out if interested.
Did you miss out on updates? Notifications keeps you up to date on job openings,live talks and more
